summary: Versatile Software Engineer with 4+ years of experience in full-stack development, specializing in building scalable systems and improving developer workflows. Proficient in modern web technologies, CI/CD pipelines, and cloud infrastructure. Adept at identifying inefficiencies and implementing robust solutions to optimize build processes and deployments.

details: üèÖ GPA: 3.79, Top 4% of class.
Mastered algorithms and data structures, achieving Top 2.5% LeetCode ranking and solving 1,000+ coding challenges.
Strengthened problem-solving, teamwork, and software engineering skills through intensive training.
Enhanced developer productivity by streamlining CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions and Docker, ensuring seamless AWS deployments (Lambda, EC2, S3, RDS).
Optimized build processes across the stack, reducing compile and test times by 18%.

items.role: Africa to Silicon Valley | Software Engineer and Educator
details: Redesigned deployment pipelines for RateEat and EzyPay using Kubernetes and Docker, increasing system uptime by 15%.
Architected and scaled backend systems with Node.js, Redis, and MongoDB, enabling seamless microservices integration.
Identified inefficiencies in build and deployment processes, implementing tools and scripts that enhanced team productivity.
Built modular, secure RESTful APIs with Flask, PostgreSQL, and Docker, supporting scalable deployments.
Improved CI/CD workflows by integrating Jenkins and Kubernetes, reducing deployment errors by 20%.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance application stability through advanced testing frameworks.
Optimized payment system performance with Go, enhancing transaction reliability and scalability.
Developed dynamic restaurant rating and review features using React and Redux, improving user engagement.
Programming Languages: Python, Go, JavaScript, TypeScript, C++, Rust, Bash/Shell scripting
Web Technologies: HTML5, CSS3, React, Next.js, Redux, TypeScript, Vue.js, WebAssembly
Backend Technologies: Node.js, Flask, FastAPI, RESTful APIs, GraphQL, WebSockets
Cloud Technologies and DevOps: AWS (Lambda, S3, EC2, RDS), Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, Jenkins, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis
Tools: cmake, yarn, Kubernetes, Linux tooling
Achieved Top 2.5% ranking in LeetCode global programming competition, showcasing expertise in Python and Go.
Reduced system deployment times by over 25% through innovative CI/CD pipeline optimizations.
